documents.document: George Will is a “moron.” #nevertrump
"I just realized that if you listen to Carly Fiorina for more than ten minutes straight you develop a massive headache She has zero chance!"
"I think the only difference between me and other candidates is that Im more honest and my women are more beautiful" https://t.co/4qYc07snGi
“I mean what was he doing with Lee Harvey Oswald, shortly before the death — before the shooting? It’s horrible.” about Sen Cruz's father
“How stupid are the people of Iowa?” #NeverTrump #TCOT
“A person who is very flat-chested is very hard to be a 10” #NeverTrump #TCOT
"Remember new environment friendly lightbulbs can cause cancer. Be careful- the idiots who came up with this stuff don't care." #NeverTrump
“Happy #CincoDeMayo! The best taco bowls are made in Trump Tower Grill. I love Hispanics!” #nevertrump
“Well, someone’s doing the raping, Don! I mean, somebody’s doing it. Who’s doing the raping? Who’s doing the raping?” #NeverTrump #TCOT
"Robert Pattinson should not take back Kristen Stewart.She cheated on him like a dog & will do it again-just watch. He can do much better"
“[Angelina Jolie’s] been with so many guys she makes me look like a baby... And, I just don’t even find her attractive.” #nevertrump
"While @BetteMidler is an extremely unattractive woman, I refuse to say that because I always insist on being politically correct" #tcot
“You haven’t been called, go back to Univision.” to Latino reporter Jorge Ramos #nevertrump
"No more massive injections. Tiny children are not horses—one vaccine at a time, over time." #TrumpIsWithYou
“I like kids. I mean, I won’t do anything to take care of ‘em. I’ll supply funds, and she’ll take care of the kids.” #nevertrump
“I mean what was he doing with Lee Harvey Oswald, shortly before the death — before the shooting? It’s horrible.” about Sen Cruz's father
“The concept of shaking hands is absolutely terrible, and statistically I’ve been proven right.” #NeverTrump #TCOT
“Sorry losers and haters but my IQ is one of the highest-and you all know it! Please dont feel so stupid or insecure, it’s not your fault”
“Do you think Putin will go to The Miss Universe Pageant in November in Moscow if so, will he become my new best friend?” #nevertrump
"We should go for waterboarding and we should go tougher than waterboarding." #nevertrump
“How stupid are the people of Iowa?” #NeverTrump #TCOT
'Women: “You have to treat ’em like shit.”' #nevertrump
"Putting a wife to work is a very dangerous thing" #nevertrump
